com.seb.beroepsproduct.entities.items.ItemDropper
public class ItemDropper extends com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.EntitySpawner
Handles dropping items if the enemy is killed and has not already dropped an item

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemDropper

      public ItemDropper(Player player, Enemy enemy, long intervalInMs)
      Initialises a item dropper for an Enemy
      Parameters:
      player - The Player that could take the Item
      enemy - The Enemy to check
      intervalInMs - The interval in milliseconds for checking

  • Method Details

    • spawnEntities

      public void spawnEntities()
      Spawns Item, every item has a certain chance to spawn. If item is not spawned after killing an enemy the item is dropped but invisible and will not register colliding events.
      Specified by:
      spawnEntities in class com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.EntitySpawner

    • setItemDropped

      public void setItemDropped(boolean itemDropped)
      Sets if the item has dropped or not
      Parameters:
      itemDropped - true if dropped otherwise false
